verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> <S%G3756>(not<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>),
<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> to the <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> of <S%G1053>Galatia:<s%>

<S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> he might <S%G1807>deliver<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1764>present<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G165>age,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>â€”
to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

I <S%G2296>marvel<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G3346>are<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5030>quickly<s%> <S%G3346>deserting<s%> <S%G575>him<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G2087>different<s%> "good <S%G2098>news<s%>";

<S%G3739>and<s%> <S%G2076>there<s%> <S%G3756>isn't<s%> <S%G1487>another<s%> "good <S%G3361>news.<s%>" Only there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G5015>trouble<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G3344>pervert<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> <S%G2249>we,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> should preach to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2097>any<s%> "good news" other <S%G3844>than<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2097>preached<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> let him <S%G2077>be<s%> <S%G331>cursed.<s%>

<S%G5613>As<s%> we have said <S%G4280>before,<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> <S%G3004>I<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> say <S%G3825>again:<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man preaches to <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2097>any<s%> "good news" other <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> which you <S%G3880>received,<s%> let him <S%G2077>be<s%> <S%G331>cursed.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> am <S%G3982>I<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> seeking the <S%G3982>favor<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%> <S%G2228>Or<s%> am I <S%G2212>striving<s%> to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G444>men?<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G302>I<s%> were <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G700>pleasing<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G302>I<s%> <S%G3756>wouldn't<s%> <S%G2252>be<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> I make <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3588>concerning<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G444>man.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> did <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3880>receive<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> from <S%G444>man,<s%> nor was <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> it came to me <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> you have heard <S%G191>of<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> way of <S%G391>living<s%> in time <S%G4218>past<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2454>Jews<s%>' religion, how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2596>beyond<s%> <S%G5236>measure<s%> I <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4199>ravaged<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G2532>I<s%> <S%G4298>advanced<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2454>Jews<s%>' religion <S%G5228>beyond<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of my own <S%G4915>age<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1085>countrymen,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> more <S%G4056>exceedingly<s%> <S%G2207>zealous<s%> for the <S%G3967>traditions<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3862>fathers.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> it was the good <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>'s <S%G2836>womb,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> me <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%>

to <S%G601>reveal<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2097>preach<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> I <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G4323>confer<s%> with <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%>

<S%G3761>nor<s%> did I go <S%G424>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> those who <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> I <S%G565>went<s%> away <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G688>Arabia.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3825>Then<s%> I <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus.<s%>

<S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I went <S%G424>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G2477>visit<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1961>stayed<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1178>fifteen<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> of the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G1492>I<s%> saw no <S%G3756>one,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G2385>James,<s%> <S%G80>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>'s <S%G80>brother.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> about the things <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3756>I<s%>'m not <S%G3754><s%> <S%G5574>lying.<s%>
<S%G1899>Then<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G2824>regions<s%> of <S%G4947>Syria<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2791>Cilicia.<s%>
<S%G1161>I<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> still <S%G50>unknown<s%> by <S%G4383>face<s%> to the <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea<s%> which <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2258>they<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G191>heard:<s%> <S%G3754>"He<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2097>preaches<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G4218>once<s%> tried to <S%G4199>destroy.<s%>"
<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me.<s%>
